root: ^Student: “All that trash… The smell is horrendous.”
^<color=#7F00FF>Dr. Waterson</color>: “Luckily, the city has cracked down on issuing fines for this sort of thing.”
^<color=#7F00FF>Dr. Waterson</color>: “But wonderful job! Looks like you’ve got most of the garbage out of here.”
^<color=#7F00FF>Dr. Waterson</color>: “Your job now is to remove the harmful plants to restore the area to a healthier, more balanced state.”
^<color=#7F00FF>Dr. Waterson</color>: “Be wary, though. Some invasive animals have been terrorizing the local environment here.”
^<color=#7F00FF>Dr. Waterson</color>: “You are sure to run into at least a few of them. Keep an eye out!”
